example_sentence_english: This gossip has been going around for days.

example_sentence_italian: Ho sentito un pettegolezzo su di lui.
example_sentence_english: I heard a piece of gossip about him.

example_sentence_italian: Il pettegolezzo si è diffuso subito.

example_sentence_english: I do not care about the gossip.

The truth emerges from the gossip.
I keep away from the rumors.

example_sentence_italian: Si parla di noi nei pettegolezzi.
example_sentence_english: They talk about us in the rumors.

example_sentence_english: He wrote an article about the gossip.
